short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save, manage, and share your links with just a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of losing track of important links? Say hello to Link Saver, the must-have Chrome extension that makes managing your favorite websites a breeze! 

Special features included in this extension:
Dark mode: You can enable dark mode and your choice will be saved!
Customizable Keyboard Shortcut: Open the extension instantly with a shortcut of your choice.
Generate QR Codes: Create QR codes for easy sharing of links.
Add Current Tab: Save the URL of the current tab to your list.
Delete All Links: Clear all saved links in one action.
Export Links: Download all saved links as a Word document.
